welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sha Kok Mei, Hong Kong! Get ready to immerse yourself in the vibrant city's charm, known for its bustling markets, delicious cuisine, and stunning sights. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Sha Kok Mei has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Hong Kong International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost carriers and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a registration is required.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Shenzhen Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newly built terminal at Shenzhen Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
